NewsItem.HEADLINE: Custom RRH forecast for Ericsson
NewsItem.SUMMARY: This file converts the Mobile Experts forecast categories into the Ericsson categories, including some Small Cells and Macro base stations broken down to match with the Ericsson forecasting approach.
NewsItem.NEWSLINETEXT: Forecast categories include -Macro Classic (below 6 GHz, and 8T8R or below, above 40W RF composite power) -AAS (below 6 GHz, and 16T16R and above) -mm-wave (above 20 GHz) -Microcell (outdoor small cells, 5-20W composite RF power)
NewsItem.KEYWORDS: Macro Small Cell AAS mm-wave microcell forecast rrh
